FuncDef: Configures an IEEE 802.3 LLC SNAP Ethernet Frame PID value to be used as a MAC filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the two-byte snap-pid value to be used as a match criterion. The value can be expressed in decimal integer or hexadecimal format. Values-0 to 65535 or 0x0000 to 0xFFFF.
